#summary How to install apk app on Android Emulator

= Introduction =

Add your content here.


= Details =

1. Start Android emulator (either go to android-sdk-windows/tools, click on emulator.exe and wait it to launch, or run emulator in Eclipse.)
2. Run 'cmd' shell in Windows, go to tools directory;
3. Type "adb install vuparking.apk";
4. Wait it to be successfully installed.
